pages.text: Tamen zunxing emomen fandui su lai man wangquan suo zuo de wangyan. Su lai man bingfei bu xinyang, er shi emomen bu xinyang. Tamen jiaoshou renmen moshu [zhu],[bing mofang weizao] jiang gei zai babilun de liang wei tianshi ha lu te he ma lu te de yixie dongxi. Mei dang ta lia [tianshi] jiaoshou renmen shi, ta lia bi shuo:“Women zhishi shiyan, yin'er bie bu xiangxin.” Yushi tamen jiu cong ta lia nali xuehuile lijian fuqi de fangfa. Wei jing an la xuke, tamen jue buneng yi ci shanghai renhe ren. Tamen xuehuile dui tamen youhai er wuyi de dongxi. Tamen que yi zhidao, shei goumai moshu, shei zai houshi jue wu fu fen. Tamen yi ci chumai ziji zhen kebei! Jiaru tamen zhidao.
Jiaru tamen xinyang bing jingwei, name, zai an la nali de hui ci shi zui hao de, jiaru tamen zhidao.

Xinshimen a! Nimen bie [dui mu sheng] shuo:“Ni renzhen ting women suo yan, women ye renzhen ting ni suo yan”, nimen dang shuo:“Rang women lijie ba!” Nimen dang tingcong. Bu xinyang zhe bi shou tongku de xingfa.
You jing ren he bai ouxiang zhe zhong de bu xinyang zhe dou bu xiwang nimen de zhu jiang gei nimen renhe haoshi, dan an la ba ta de enhui te ciyu tasuo yiyu zhe. An la shi you zhongda enhui de zhu.
